tool_description:
Search though thousands of products in StockX database. 
⚡️ Highly-performant, free and daily-updated.
name: StockX API
title: StockX API

api_list.name: Get a product by ID
api_list.description: IDs are UUID and are compatible with StockX internal IDs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockx-api.p.rapidapi.com/product/01c1af38-d1d0-462c-aca3-13349dc893a9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockx-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockx-api.p.rapidapi.com/product/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockx-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for products
api_list.description:
Search for a product, up to 10 words are considered in the search query. Every fields in the response are being search (title, category, brand, price, etc...).

Use quotes to match exact words or phrases.
